t = int(input())
for _ in range(t):
    n = int(input())
    arr = list(map(int, input().split()))
    small = max(arr)
    flag = 0
    mini = 1000000007
    maxi = -1000000007
    for i in range(len(arr)):
        if arr[i] >= 0:
            mini = min(mini, arr[i] - 1)
        else:
            maxi = max(maxi, arr[i] + 1)
    print(min(-maxi, mini))

for _ in range(int(input())):
    n = int(input())
    l = list(map(int, input().split()))
    min_value = 1000000000
    for i in range(n):
        l[i] = abs(l[i])
        min_value = min(l[i], min_value)
    print(min_value - 1)

t = int(input())
for i in range(t):
    n = int(input())
    L = sorted(list(map(int, input().split())))
    x = lambda y: abs(y)
    L1 = []
    for item in L:
        L1.append(x(item))
    L1.sort()
    print(L1[0] - 1)

import math

def main():
    t = int(input())
    while t:
        solve()
        t -= 1

def solve():
    n = int(input())
    arr = [int(num) for num in input().split(' ')]
    pos = [num for num in arr if num >= 0]
    neg = [abs(num) for num in arr if num < 0]
    res = min(min(pos) if len(pos) else math.inf, min(neg) if len(neg) else math.inf)
    print(res - 1)
main()

t = int(input())
ls = []
for i in range(t):
    n = int(input())
    ls = input().split()
    for j in range(n):
        ls[j] = int(ls[j])
        if ls[j] < 0:
            ls[j] = -ls[j]
    ls.sort()
    print(ls[0] - 1)
